text:
The homes we were born into, the worlds we grew up in
—they're all different. In reality, we might never have met.
What will become of us after this? We don't know.
But this 'now,' where we're talking, feels infinitely precious.

May it continue on forever. And so, we walk on,
praying silently.

Thank you all for your hard work...!
This concludes all scenes and filming...!

Sakuragi-san, great job! It feels like we had some really
good conversations, and we've made a fantastic drama!

It was easy to work with you, and I'm grateful for the great
acting you provided. Let's collaborate again when we have the chance!
...Thank you for your hard work, Producer-san

...The last scene was so full of excitement.
I look forward to the finished product.
Are you sad that the shooting is over?

...But thanks to everyone, I was able to do my best.
I received a lot of nice words...

─ I feel like I can't wait to start my next job...
and I feel like I want to start running...

Well, I'll have to bring in a job that Mano
feels the same way about next time.

Mano, great job with the shoot...! /
Mano! Well done~!
